## ListBuilderOptions.keyMap property

Custom key mappings for list navigation and actions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
keyMap?: ListKeyMap;
```

## Remarks

Provides control over which keys trigger list actions like navigation, filtering, and help display. If not provided, uses default key bindings.
